shavehud_dialog_force_start_desc:
Weet je zeker dat je de game wilt forceren om te starten?

Gebruik dit alleen als de lobby gebug'd is of er een speler afwezig is.
Wees er zeker van dat iedereen de tijd heeft gehad om zijn uitrusting te kiezen.

Dankjewel :)
shavehud_dialog_install_fed_inv_desc:
Federal Inventory is an override mod, that gives you colorized icons for your weapons masks and deployables.
It looks great in when used with CustomHUD and will use BLTs Updater.
shavehud_dialog_rename_inv_tab_desc: Please enter the new name for this Inventory page.
shavehud_dialog_requires_superblt_desc_l:
ShaveHUD requires SuperBLT in order to work.
SuperBLT is a fork of the BLT mod-loading hook for PAYDAY 2, with a number of major improvements. 
It is fully backwards-compatable with regular BLT mods.

You can find further information and installation instructions here: 
$URL
shavehud_dialog_requires_superblt_desc_s:
ShaveHUD is no longer compatable with regular BLT.
Please update to SuperBLT to continue using it.
You can find SuperBLT at '$URL'.
shavehud_dialog_update_install_folder_de:
For automatic updates, ShaveHUD's install folder 
needs to be named 'mods/ShaveHUD-master/'. 
(Currently its 'mods/$FOLDER/')
shavehud_notification_disabled_override_: If you changed your mind, click here to get asked again.
shavehud_notification_restart_override_d: Please restart your game to start the download.
shavehud_preplanning_save_tooltip_desc: Save your current Plan, and have an easier time next time on this mission.
shavehud_preplanning_load_tooltip_desc: Opens a menu with all your saved plans.
shavehud_preplanning_reset_tooltip_desc: Removes all your assets from the current plan, as well as your votes.
shavehud_preplanning_reset_all_tooltip_d: Removes everyones assets from the current plan, as well as your votes.
shavehud_preplanning_delete_tooltip_desc: Clean up your saved plans and delete a few.
shavehud_preplanning_error_max_plans_rea: Maximum amount of saved Plans reached.
shavehud_preplanning_dialog_save_desc:
$PLAN


Please enter a name for this plan.
(Using an existing name will overwrite that plan.)
shavehud_preplanning_dialog_delete_desc: Are you sure you want to delete Plan '$NAME'?
shavehud_preplanning_msg_saved_failed: An error occurred while saving plan.
shavehud_preplanning_msg_no_save_slot: Maximum amount of saved Plans reached.
shavehud_preplanning_msg_no_current_plan: You have nothing planned, that can be saved.
shavehud_preplanning_msg_loaded_failed: An error occurred while loading plan.
shavehud_preplanning_msg_reseted_failed: An error occurred while resetting current plan.
shavehud_preplanning_msg_deleted_failed: An error occurred while deleting saved plan.
shavehud_preplanning_msg_folder_creation:
Failed to create folder: $FOLDER 
Please make sure the game has the required permissions or create it manually.
shavehud_preplanning_msg_file_creation_f:
Failed to create file: $FILE 
Please make sure the game has the required permissions or create it manually.
shavehud_inv_tab_rename_hint: Double click the selected Inventory tab to rename it.
shavehud_locked_assault: Endless Police Assault!!!  Get out as soon as possible!!!
shavehud_options_help: Customize ShaveHUD with your personal preferences.
shavehud_language_desc:
Select a localization for ShaveHUD.
(A Map change is needed to apply...)
shavehud_straight_to_main_menu_desc: Automatically skips intros and goes straight to the main menu.
shavehud_skip_blackscreen_desc:
Automatically skips the Blackscreen on Mission start.
(Host only)
shavehud_instant_restart_desc:
Automatically skips the 5 second timer before a restart in online lobbies.
(Host only)
shavehud_stat_screen_speedup_desc: Automatically speed up the experience counting, without needing to hold down space.
shavehud_stat_screen_delay_desc:
Proceeds X seconds, after your EXP got counted.
(Host only)
shavehud_loot_screen_pick_card_desc: Automatically pick a card, when the loot screen is displayed.
shavehud_loot_screen_pick_specific_card_: Specify which card to pick automatically.
shavehud_loot_screen_delay_desc:
Proceeds X seconds after you got your loot drop.
(Host only, 0 = disabled)
shavehud_replace_weapon_names_desc:
Replace the Weapon Names with their Real-World counterparts.
(A Map change is needed to apply...)
shavehud_inventory_tab_names_desc:
Customize your Inventory Tab Names.
(Change names by editing '/mods/saves/ShaveHUD_InventoryNames.txt')
shavehud_inventory_names_desc: Show the names of your weapons, armor, deployables, etc. inside its box in the inventory.
shavehud_skill_names_desc: Always show the names of skills in the skilltree view.
shavehud_show_contractor_job_heat_desc: Shows job heat in the contract broker list.
shavehud_show_mini_icons_desc: Always show the mod icons of all weapons, not just the selected one.
shavehud_no_slowmotion_desc: Disable Slow Motion during mask up or when getting downed.
shavehud_reset_options_desc: Reset all Settings to their default value.
shavehud_reset_options_confirm: Are you sure, you want to reset all Settings to their default value?
shavehud_panels_options_help: Options for all the general HUD panels, as CustomHUD, Suspicion, Damage Indicator, DrivingHUD and many more.
shavehud_use_customhud_desc:
Replace the default HUD with the advanced CustomHUD, made by Se7en.
(A Map change is needed to apply...)
shavehud_adv_assault_desc:
Show assault phase, time and spawns left during assault.
(Host Only)
shavehud_assault_position_desc: Horizontal position of the Assault banner.
shavehud_pacified_civs_desc: Change the waypoint of untied civilians, while they are pacified.
shavehud_use_realammo_desc: Shows ammo left, not taking the rounds in your current magazine into account.
shavehud_enable_burstmode_desc: Enable a burst fire mode for your weapons.
shavehud_playerpanel_options_help: Setting for your own HUD Panel.
shavehud_teampanels_options_help: Settings for your Teammates HUD Panels.
shavehud_panels_position_desc: Horizontal position of the HUD panel.
shavehud_panels_scale_desc: Scaling factor of the HUD Panel.
shavehud_panels_oppacity_desc: Select the Opacity of the HUD panel.
shavehud_panels_truncate_tags_desc: Try to truncate clan tags from player names.
shavehud_panels_show_ping_desc: Show the players ping to you.
shavehud_panels_show_status_desc: Show the players status (health, armor, etc.)
shavehud_panels_condition_icon_color_des: Set the color of the condition icon (downed, in custody, swan song, etc.)
shavehud_panels_show_special_equip_desc: Show the players picked up special equipment.
shavehud_panels_special_equip_rows_desc: Number of Special Equipment Items that get placed in one column.
shavehud_panels_show_callsign_desc: Show a callsign for that player.
shavehud_panels_show_stamina_desc: Shows a Stamina circle inside your Healthbar.
shavehud_panels_show_downcounter_desc:
Shows a downcounter for each non AI. 
The counter shows your downs left and your teammates downs count.
shavehud_panels_build_time_desc:
Show a joining players build for X seconds.
(0 = Always)
shavehud_panels_weapon_icon_desc: Which weapon icons do you want to see?
shavehud_panels_weapon_firemode_desc: Show weapon fire mode, or hide it.
shavehud_panels_interaction_time_desc: Only show teammates interaction, if its longer than X seconds.
shavehud_panels_use_ai_color_desc: Use a custom color for the names of bots. (This also affects dmg popups)
shavehud_panels_ai_color_desc: Set the custom color to use for the names of bots. (This also affects dmg popups)
shavehud_chat_waittime_desc:
The time after which the chat fades out
(0 = Never)
shavehud_chat_fontsize_desc: Font Size for the ingame Chat-Box.
shavehud_chat_outputlines_desc: Max Lines to display before scrolling is enabled.
shavehud_spam_filter_desc: Removes PocoHUD and [NGBTO] spam messages from your chat.
shavehud_chat_inputlines_desc: Number of lines of text you can type
shavehud_chat_colored_bg_desc: Colorize the line bg based on the message source
shavehud_suspicion_options_help: Options for the size of the suspicion panel, as well as its visible components.
shavehud_suspicion_scale_desc: Scaling factor for the suspicion panel elements.
shavehud_susp_numeric_outline_desc: Show a black outline around the numeric Suspicion text.
shavehud_killcounter_options_help: Options for the appearance of the kill counter
shavehud_killcounter_player_show_killcou: Display a killcounter on your HUD.
shavehud_killcounter_player_color_desc: Select the color for your killcounter.
shavehud_killcounter_player_show_special: Display kills of special enemies separately.
shavehud_killcounter_player_show_accurac: Display your current accuracy on your HUD.
shavehud_killcounter_team_show_killcount: Display a killcounter on your teammates HUDs.
shavehud_killcounter_team_color_desc: Select the color of the killcounters for your teammates.
shavehud_killcounter_team_show_special_d: Display kills of special enemies separately.
shavehud_killcounter_team_show_ai_desc: Do Bots get a Killcounter too?
shavehud_corpse_limit_desc:
How much corpses should we allow to lay around at the same time?
(A Map change is needed to apply...)
shavehud_show_drivinghud_desc:
Show a little HUD in the bottom right while driving.
(A Map change is needed to apply...)
shavehud_drivinghud_show_vehicle_desc: Display a little image of the vehicle and masks of player driving with you.
shavehud_drivinghud_show_loot_desc: Display the vehicles currently loaded and maximum loot numbers.
shavehud_drivinghud_show_passengers_desc: Show the amount of passengers in the vehicle and the total amount of seats.
shavehud_drivinghud_show_gear_desc: Display which gear you are driving in.
shavehud_drivinghud_speed_in_mph_desc:
Display the speed in mph.
(Uses km/h otherwise.)
shavehud_drivinghud_show_rpm_desc: Display the vehicles revolutions per minute.
shavehud_infopanels_options_help: Options for the info boxes of HUD List.
shavehud_use_hudlist_desc: HUDList can display many useful things, incl. Drill timers, enemy or loot count, assets on the map, etc. (A Map change is needed to apply...)
shavehud_hudlist_scale_right_desc: Scaling factor of the right list items.
shavehud_hudlist_scale_left_desc: Scaling factor of the left list items.
shavehud_hudlist_scale_buff_desc: Scaling factor of the buff list items.
shavehud_hudlist_box_color_desc:
Front color for Left- and Right List Boxes.
(Currently a Map change is needed to apply...)
shavehud_hudlist_box_bg_color_desc:
Background color for Left- and Right List Boxes.
(Currently a Map change is needed to apply...)
shavehud_hudlist_civcolor_desc: Color for Civilians and Hostages in EnemyCounter.
shavehud_hudlist_thugcolor_desc: Color for Thugs and Mobsters in EnemyCounter.
shavehud_hudlist_copcolor_desc: Color for Cops, SWATs and Heavy SWATs in EnemyCounter.
shavehud_hudlist_specialcolor_desc: Color for Specials and Turrets in EnemyCounter.
shavehud_hudlist_progress_alpha_left_des: Alpha value for the progress bars on left list items.
shavehud_hudlist_progress_alpha_right_de: Alpha value for the progress bars on right list items.
shavehud_hudlist_progress_alpha_buff_des: Alpha value for the progress bars on buff list items.
shavehud_infopanels_left_options_help: Options for the left info list.
shavehud_hudlist_show_timers_desc: Display Timers for Drills, Hacks, etc.
shavehud_hudlist_show_equipment_desc: Determine if we should display that equipment on the right side of your screen.
shavehud_hudlist_show_ecm_retrigger_desc: Show, when an ECM is ready to be retriggered.
shavehud_hudlist_show_minions_desc: Show health of all jokered Cops.
shavehud_hudlist_show_own_minions_only_d: Only display your own jokered Cops.
shavehud_hudlist_show_pagers_desc: Show Timer for remaining pager time, before the alarm triggers.
shavehud_hudlist_remove_answered_pagers_: Remove the pager contour, if it is already getting answered.
shavehud_infopanels_right_options_help: Options for the right info list.
shavehud_hudlist_show_enemies_desc: Show the amount of Enemies on the map.
shavehud_hudlist_aggregate_enemies_desc: Show one HUD Box for all Enemies.
shavehud_hudlist_show_turrets_desc: Show amount of turret vans on the map.
shavehud_hudlist_show_civilians_desc: Show amount of untied civilians on the map.
shavehud_hudlist_aggregate_hostages_desc: Show all types of hostages in a singe info box.
shavehud_hudlist_show_pager_count_desc: Display the amount of triggered pagers while in stealth.
shavehud_hudlist_show_cam_count_desc: Show the amount of active cameras while in stealth.
shavehud_hudlist_show_bodybags_count_des: Show the amount of bodybags in your extended inventory directly on your screen while in stealth.
shavehud_hudlist_show_corpse_count_desc: Show the amount of Corpses and bagged bodies on the map while in stealth.
shavehud_hudlist_show_loot_desc: Count the baggable Loot on the current map.
shavehud_hudlist_aggregate_loot_desc: Show all loot types in one count value.
shavehud_hudlist_separate_bagged_loot_de: Separate unbagged and bagged loot counter.
shavehud_hudlist_show_potential_loot_des:
Show the amount of crates on the map in the loot counter. 
(Remember, crates might be empty...)
shavehud_hudlist_show_special_pickups_de: Show amount of chemicals, keycards and other stuff on the map.
shavehud_hudlist_show_mission_pickups_de: Show amount of chemicals, keycards, planks and other mission pickups on the map.
shavehud_hudlist_show_collectables_picku: Show amount of Gage packages, Spec-Ops Cases & Keys et cetera on the map.
shavehud_hudlist_show_valuables_pickups_: Show amount of valuable items, like money bundles or necklaces on the map.
shavehud_infopanels_buff_options_help: Options for the buff info list.
shavehud_infopanels_buff_mastermind_opti: Enable or Disable visual indicators for Mastermind Skills.
shavehud_infopanels_buff_enforcer_option: Enable or Disable visual indicators for Enforcer Skills.
shavehud_infopanels_buff_technician_opti: Enable or Disable visual indicators for Technician Skills.
shavehud_infopanels_buff_ghost_options_h: Enable or Disable visual indicators for Ghost Skills.
shavehud_infopanels_buff_fugitive_option: Enable or Disable visual indicators for Fugitive Skills.
shavehud_infopanels_buff_perkdecks_optio: Enable or Disable visual indicators for Perk Decks.
shavehud_infopanels_buff_gageboosts_opti: Enable or Disable visual indicators for Gage Boosts.
shavehud_infopanels_buff_henchmen_option: Enable or Disable visual indicators for Henchmen Skills.
shavehud_hudlist_show_buffs_desc: Display active Buffs in the bottom center of your screen.
shavehud_hudlist_damage_increase_compbuf: Composite Buff item, displays added value of all damage increasing skills.
shavehud_hudlist_damage_reduction_compbu: Composite Buff item, displays added value of all damage reducing skills.
shavehud_hudlist_melee_damage_increase_c: Composite Buff item, displays added value of all melee damage increasing skills.
shavehud_hudlist_passive_health_regen_co: Composite Buff item, displays added value of all passive Health regeneration effects.
shavehud_hudlist_total_dodge_chance_comp: Composite Buff item, displays added value of all dodge increasing skills.
shavehud_waypoints_color_desc: The color of the default mission waypoints.
shavehud_waypoints_show_ammo_bag_desc: Show Waypoints for Ammo bags, telling you the Percentage left.
shavehud_waypoints_show_doc_bag_desc: Show Waypoints for Doctor Bags, stating the number of charges left.
shavehud_waypoints_show_first_aid_kit_de: Show Waypoints for First Aid Kits, showing its skill effects.
shavehud_waypoints_show_body_bag_desc: Show Waypoints for bodybag cases, telling you the amount of Bodybags left.
shavehud_waypoints_show_grenade_crate_de: Show Waypoints for Grenade Cases, telling you the amount of Grenades left.
shavehud_waypoints_show_sentries_desc: Show Waypoints for Sentries, telling you the amount of ammo left.
shavehud_waypoints_show_ecms_desc: Show Waypoints for ECMs, telling you its remaining battery and feedback duration.
shavehud_waypoints_show_timers_desc: Show Waypoints for timers, telling you the time left and their active Upgrades.
shavehud_waypoints_show_loot_desc: Show the name of the loot above it, when looking near it.
shavehud_waypoints_loot_icon_desc: Show a bag icon on bagged loot.
shavehud_waypoints_loot_offset_desc: Set the height offset of the text label on loot.
shavehud_waypoints_loot_bagged_offset_de: Set the height offset of the text label on bagged loot.
shavehud_waypoints_loot_angle_desc: Set the angle the text label is visible in.
shavehud_waypoints_show_special_equipmen: Show waypoints for various different equipments. Good to learn all the different locations.
shavehud_waypoints_show_minions_desc:
Show a Minions Name above its head, in the color of the player who converted him.
Also shows his Killcount.
shavehud_waypoints_show_pager_desc: Show a waypoint for activated pagers. Changes its color, when someone is answering it.
shavehud_tabstats_options_help: Configure the look of your Tabscreen.
shavehud_tabstats_clock_mode_desc: Which mode should the clock use?
shavehud_use_tabstats_desc:
Show your Statistics on Tab Screen instead, of the Mission briefing.
(A Map change is needed to apply...)
shavehud_tabstats_font_size_desc: Font Size for the advanced statistics list.
shavehud_tabstats_color_desc: Color for the advanced statistics list.
shavehud_tabstats_actual_mask_desc: Use your Actual mask instead of your played character picture.
shavehud_tabstats_numeric_loot_desc: Disable the bag counting minigame and display the number right away.
shavehud_crewloadout_options_help: Choose where you want to get Information on which gear and skills your teammates are bringing.
shavehud_crewloadout_lobby_desc: Adds a button to your Lobby screen, that can display the loadout of you and your crew.
shavehud_crewloadout_cs_lobby_desc: Adds a new tab right next to the modifiers and rewards in the crimespree lobby.
shavehud_crewloadout_briefing_desc: Replaces the default Crew Loadout Panel in Mission briefing.
shavehud_crewloadout_tabscreen_desc:
Displays the Skills, Perk and current Ping of players in your lobby. 
(Disabled if you use this feature of LobbyPlayerInfo)
shavehud_profilemenu_replace_desc: Replaces the default Profile-Selector with ShaveHUDs advanced one.
shavehud_dmgindicator_options_help: Set the fade time, size and colors or your damage indicators.
shavehud_show_dmg_indicator_desc: Turns the 4 static damage indicators into several dynamic ones, moving according to your position and the position you were damaged from.
shavehud_dmg_ind_time_desc: Determines the time, the indicator will be shown.
shavehud_dmg_ind_size_desc: Determines the size of the circle, the Indicators are placed around.
shavehud_dmg_indicator_max_count_desc: Specify the max amount of damage indicators on your screen.
shavehud_dmg_shield_color_desc: Color of the indicator, when you only lose armor.
shavehud_dmg_health_color_desc: Color of the indicator, when you lose health.
shavehud_dmg_crit_color_desc: Color of the indicator, when your health is getting low.
shavehud_dmg_vehicle_color_desc: Color of the indicator, when the vehicle you are in gets hit.
shavehud_dmg_friendlyfire_color_desc: Color of the indicator, when you get hit by fire or explosives.
shavehud_dmgpopup_options_help: Popup near an enemies head, displaying the damage dealt.
shavehud_dmg_popup_scale_desc: Changes the size of the damage popups.
shavehud_dmg_popup_skull_scale_desc: Changes the size of the skull icon when it was a kill.
shavehud_dmg_popup_skull_align_desc: Changes the alignment of the skull icon when it was a kill.
shavehud_dmg_popup_time_desc: Determines how long the popup will stay.
shavehud_dmg_popup_height_desc: Determines how high above the enemy the popup will render.
shavehud_dmg_popup_alpha_desc: Set the opacity of the popup.
shavehud_dmg_popup_color_desc: Set the color of the popup for bodyshots
shavehud_dmg_popup_critical_color_desc: Set the color of the popup for critical hits.
shavehud_dmg_popup_headshot_color_desc: Set the color of the popup for headshots.
shavehud_enemyhealthbar_options_help: Determine which units should get an healthbar.
shavehud_show_floatinghealthbar_desc: Display Floating Enemy Healthbar at the top enter, when aiming at an enemy.
shavehud_show_enemyhealthbar_desc:
Display Enemy Healthbar at the top enter, when aiming at an enemy.
(A Map change is needed to apply...)
shavehud_show_civhealthbar_desc: Also show Healthbar for Civilians and TeamAI.
shavehud_show_healthbar_pointer_desc: Show Arrow under the Healthbar, aiming at the Owner of the Healthbar.
shavehud_press2hold_lock_mode_desc:
Lock, when already interaction for more than X seconds. (Progress)
Lock, when total Interaction Time is more than X seconds. (Total)
shavehud_press2hold_min_timer_duration_d: The Min Timer Duration for the Interaction to lock.
shavehud_press2hold_show_lockindicator_d: Show transparent red/green circle overlay, to indicate weather the interaction is locked or not.
shavehud_press2hold_equipment_cancel_des:
Interrupt a locked Interaction with your equipment key.
(Otherwise by pressing your Interaction key again.)
shavehud_press2hold_interrupt_hint_desc: Show a text to remind you, which button will interrupt your Interaction.
shavehud_press2hold_show_timer_desc: Display the remaining time inside the Interaction circle.
shavehud_press2hold_show_circle_desc: Determine if the standard interaction circle should be displayed.
shavehud_press2hold_circle_scale_desc: Scaling factor of the interaction circle.
shavehud_press2hold_timer_scale_desc: Scaling factor of the center timer (Takes circle scale into account).
shavehud_press2hold_text_scale_desc: Scaling factor of the interaction text below the circle.
shavehud_press2hold_show_reload_circle_d: Determine, if we should show a reload as an interaction.
shavehud_press2hold_show_melee_circle_de: Determine, if we should show a melee charge as an interaction.
shavehud_press2hold_timer_color_start_de: Color for the Timer to start with.
shavehud_press2hold_timer_color_desc: Color for the Timer to reach on completion.
shavehud_press2hold_show_timer_outline_d: Show a black outline around the remaining time text.
shavehud_doubletap_nades_stealth_desc:
When checked, you need to doubletap to throw a nade in stealth. 
Only to prevent accidents.
shavehud_press_to_mask_desc: When checked, you only have to press (rather than hold) to mask up.
shavehud_inventory_options_help: Options to change the visuals of your Inventory and alter Equipment behavior.
shavehud_equipment_senty_auto_ap_desc: Sentries will spawn in AP Mode, if you have the required Skill.
shavehud_equipment_tripmine_auto_sensor_: Trip-Mines will spawn in Sensor Mode, while you are in stealth.
shavehud_equipment_ecm_feedback_disabled: ECM Feedback will be disabled during stealth.
shavehud_equipment_shaped_charge_disable:
When checked, you need to doubletap to deploy shaped charges in stealth. 
Only to prevent accidents.
shavehud_equipment_keycard_doors_disable:
When checked, you need to doubletap to close doors in hoxton breakout day 2. 
Only to prevent accidents.
shavehud_override_fedinv_desc:
Enable colorized Inventory icons.
Requires game restart to fully take effect.
shavehud_laser_autoon_desc: Automatically turns the laser gadget on at startup, on weapons that have one.
shavehud_show_angled_sight_desc: Tilt the weapon in your Hand, while the angled sight is enabled.
shavehud_gadget_team_sentry_laser_option: Settings for your Teammates sentries lasers.
shavehud_gadget_sniper_laser_options_hel: Setting for the lasers of enemy snipers.
shavehud_gadget_turret_laser_active_opti: Laser settings for the active SWAT turret.
shavehud_gadget_turret_laser_rearming_op: Laser settings for the reloading SWAT turret.
shavehud_gadget_turret_laser_mad_options: Laser settings for the jammed SWAT turret.
shavehud_gadgets_enabled_desc: Use this definition instead of the gadget configuration.
shavehud_gadgets_beam_r_desc: Red component of the laser color.
shavehud_gadgets_beam_g_desc: Green component of the laser color.
shavehud_gadgets_beam_b_desc: Blue component of the laser color.
shavehud_gadgets_dot_match_desc: Determines, if the laser dot should match the beam in color.
shavehud_gadgets_dot_r_desc: Red component of the laser dots color.
shavehud_gadgets_dot_g_desc: Green component of the laser dots color.
shavehud_gadgets_dot_b_desc: Blue component of the laser dots color.
shavehud_gadgets_glow_match_desc: Determines, if the lasers glow should match the beam in color.
shavehud_gadgets_glow_r_desc: Red component of the laser glow color.
shavehud_gadgets_glow_g_desc: Green component of the laser glow color.
shavehud_gadgets_glow_b_desc: Blue component of the laser glow color.
shavehud_gadgets_light_r_desc: Red component of the flashlight color.
shavehud_gadgets_light_g_desc: Green component of the flashlight color.
shavehud_gadgets_light_b_desc: Blue component of the flashlight color.
shavehud_gadgets_light_angle_desc: The angle the flashlight shines in.
shavehud_gadgets_rainbow_frequency_desc: Determines how fast the rainbow changes colors.
shavehud_gadgets_pulse_min_desc: Minimum Opacity modificator that gets used.
shavehud_gadgets_pulse_max_desc: Maximum Opacity modificator that gets used.
shavehud_gadgets_pulse_frequency_desc: Determines the time it takes the pulse from minimum to maximum opacity multiplicator.
shavehud_skipit_options_help: Options to skip unnecessary menus automatically to save your time.
shavehud_assaultbanner_options_help: Options to change the Assault Banner.
shavehud_create_empty_lobby_desc:
Create a contractless multiplayer lobby.
(defaults to friends-only, changeable to public or private)
shavehud_item_insta_custody_mod_desc: Do you want to go into custody?
shavehud_autokick_cheat_mods_desc: Automatically kick players using cheat mods (that can impact your gameplay)
shavehud_badass_camera_desc: Enable cinematic camera effects in main menu
shavehud_bag_tilt_removal_desc: Disable the camera tilt when carrying bags
shavehud_bigger_better_replaced_desc: Replaces "The Bigger The Better" with "SpecOps Suppressor" (model only)
shavehud_clear_descriptions_desc: Improved descriptions for weapon gadgets and special ammo
shavehud_correct_armor_sorting_desc: Order armor by protection in ascending order
shavehud_fix_ability_use_desc: Allow using perkdeck abilities while driving or shooting
shavehud_fix_auto_fire_sound_desc: Prevent duplicate sound playback on single shots
shavehud_fix_bot_bullet_collision_desc: Allow player shots to pass through Team AI
shavehud_fix_bullet_push_desc: Disable the killing bullet push that causes visual glitches (Shotguns and Stealth unaffected)
shavehud_fix_cloaker_cam_lock_desc: Prevents Cloakers from locking your camera
shavehud_fix_crimespree_crash_loss_desc: Prevents losing your crimespree after crashing
shavehud_fix_crimespree_phalanx_spawn_li: Forces Phalanx Shields to adhere to spawn limits
shavehud_fix_diff_check_fallback_desc: Fixes scripted spawns which are broken on Mayhem/Death Sentence
shavehud_fix_dozer_sprint_desc: Prevent Bulldozers from sprinting near players, as originally intended
shavehud_fix_keep_heist_outfits_desc: Override outfits if the heist has a specific one (client-side only)
shavehud_fix_logical_heist_outfits_desc: Use Parka for Boiling Point, Legacy Tactical for Slaughterhouse
shavehud_fix_reload_speed_boost_desc: Allow reload speed boost affectig single reload weapons
shavehud_fix_shotgun_reload_desc: Fix an issue where Shotguns and similar weapons only reload one round
shavehud_fix_stale_lobby_desc: Report lobby as contractless to Steam rather than the last finished heist
shavehud_hidden_dlc_desc: Hide latest DLC advertisement on main menu
shavehud_hidden_updates_desc: Hide Content Updates on main menu
shavehud_instant_custody_desc: Enables menu option to go into custody voluntarily
shavehud_inventory_count_desc: Display additional information for throwables and equipment
shavehud_kick_friend_desc: Allow friends to rejoin your lobby after a kick
shavehud_ladder_improvements_desc: Makes ladder handling much more intuitive, see modwork.shop/23192
shavehud_mask_in_outfit_screen_desc: Display your mask in outfit screen
shavehud_no_fade_desc: Remove Fade to Black in main menu
shavehud_no_red_lasers_desc: Replaces red teammate lasers with the default green
shavehud_no_sway_desc: Remove fake weapon sway when aiming down sights
shavehud_no_weapon_rotation_desc: Remove Weapon Preview Rotation in the Blackmarket
shavehud_player_blood_desc: Generate bloodsplats when players are hit
shavehud_redundant_card_removal_desc: Remove money and experience from the loot table
shavehud_shield_despawn_timer_desc: Despawn dead Shields after a timeout
shavehud_shield_despawn_timer_value_desc: Timeout in seconds for despawning dead Shields
shavehud_skin_hider_desc: Display Infamy cards instad of skins in lobby (where applicable)
shavehud_starring_desc: Display player and character names on blackscreen
shavehud_vehicle_fov_value_desc: Set FOV for all vehicles to this
shavehud_fix_third_person_recoil_desc: Enable firing/recoil animations for most weapons in third person
